item.title: Occiput.io
item.description: OFFICIAL WEBSITE OF THE PROJECT Occiput.io is an open source software for Tomographic reconstruction based on GPU computing and on Python. The design of occiput.io makes it extremely easy to reconstruct tomographic images starting from the raw data produced by imaging systems: PET, PET-MRI and SPECT. Occiput.io is designed for GPU computing, itâ€™s blazing fast! To date, Occiput and the NiftyRec ray-tracer (on which Occiput is based), have been downloaded more than 12000 times.
